subtitles.text: Rough Rough Members 2-shot Talk
This corner will be done by just two members.

First question.

That's right. The other day, when I played head-bumps with her, she was already spoiled.

I was surprised that they were so much softer than I imagined.

I said I like to listen to the radio,
The teacher asked me, "Whose radio do you like? He asked me who's radio I like,

I'm right there! I'm right there!
I don't call out to them.
I might see them.
I don't tell him that,

It's amazing.

You don't like it? That boy.

Maybe he's watching you. I'm doing it, Fuu.

I'm glad.

Next.
Monamin.

Please continue to support my singing ability.

I'll do my best to get better.

Ryoka-chan.

What? I'm scared.
Hayashi, Sasaki, Saito.

When you get sleepy, your soul goes somewhere else.

Manami.

There are two answers for every day.

When everyone is still drinking one bottle, there are two or three empty bottles on the table.

I drink everything.
